description: Tobi, whose real name is Obito Uchiha, is the leader of Akatsuki who initially acts as a regular member of the group. He first appears as a carefree and a goofy person whose actions often result on him being attacked by his partner, Deidara. After Deidara dies in a suicidal bid to kill Sasuke Uchiha, Tobi starts taking a special interest in Sasuke`s development up to Itachi Uchiha`s death while leading the Akatsuki. He falsely claims to be Madara Uchiha, the leader of the Uchiha clan, and shows a more serious personality.
name: Tobi
